title: AI startup Flex raises $60 million to offer finance tools for mid-sized businesses
description: Dec 4 (Reuters) - Flex, an artificial intelligence startup that aims to be a one-stop shop for the financial needs of mid-sized business owners, said on Thursday it has raised $60 million in a Portage Ventures-led funding round.
content:
Dec 4 (Reuters) - Flex, an artificial intelligence startup that aims to be a one-stop shop for the financial needs of mid-sized business owners, said on Thursday it has raised $60 million in a Portage Ventures-led funding round.

title: WhatsApp faces European antitrust investigation over artificial intelligence
description: The European Commission said it opened the formal investigation because of concerns about WhatsApps move to limit access for third-party AI providers. The Commission, which is the blocs executive arm, said a recent policy update could mean that rival AI companies are blocked from offering their AI assistants on the platform, while Metas chatbot service remains accessible to users.
content: WhatsApp faces an antitrust investigation in the European Union, where regulators said on Thursday that they're looking into the messaging service's artificial intelligence policy. The European Commission said it opened the formal investigation becau... [1154 chars]

title: AI is ushering in a new era for the diagnosis and treatment of vision loss
description: Tools powered by artificial intelligence can now be used to provide a continuum of care, according to experts who spoke at the recent WCI Summit.
content:
One such example is Visilan, which uses smartphone imaging, telemedicine, and AI to screen, diagnose, and monitor patients for vision care.
And with this technology, more of the 1 billion-plus patients who live with vision loss can be treated, Jordan... [1491 chars]

title: Micron ceasing RAM for consumers has gamers saying 'PC gaming and consoles are doomed'
description: Micron Technology, a huge computer memory and storage making company, has confirmed it's shutting down its consumer business Crucial to focus on creating advanced memory chips used in artificial intelligence (AI) data centres with gamers declaring "PC gaming and consoles are doomed".
content:
Micron Technology, a huge computer memory and storage making company, has confirmed it's shutting down its consumer business Crucial to focus on creating advanced memory chips used in artificial intelligence (AI) data centres.

title: WhatsApp faces European antitrust investigation over artificial intelligence
description: WhatsApp is under EU antitrust investigation over its AI policy, with regulators probing if Meta's changes unfairly block rival AI providers from the platform.
content:
The European Commission is investigating WhatsApp over concerns its AI policy may block rival AI assistants, while Meta's chatbot remains available. Italy is conducting a separate probe.
By AP

title: Industrial action on agenda as actors balloted by Equity over AI scanning concerns
description: The actors' union is canvassing 7,000 members working in film and TV over artificial intelligence protections.
content:
Thousands of members of actors' trade union Equity are being asked whether they would support industrial action over artificial intelligence protections.
The organisation has launched an indicative ballot among about 7,000 members working in film and... [1827 chars]
